original_text: Now by chance a priest was going down that road, and when he saw him he passed by on the other side.
korean_text: 마침 한 제사장이 그 길로 내려가다가 그를 보고 피하여 지나가고

sentences.original_text: Now by chance a priest was going down that road
sentences.korean_translation: 마침 한 제사장이 그 길을 내려가고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: he passed by on the other side
